channel.title: Authors on cSTAR (Draft)
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on cSTAR (Draft)

item.description: Dr. Ankit Gangwal is an Assistant Professor at IIIT Hyderabad, India. He has worked in different mainstream areas of research, including distributed ledger technology (blockchain and cryptocurrencies), networking (ICN and SDN), and AI (GAN-based password cracking). However, the main theme of his research has always been security and privacy. His research work is multidisciplinary. Currently, He is focusing on Blockchain-, Privacy-, and Security-related research areas.

Dr. Ankit Gangwal is an Assistant Professor at IIIT Hyderabad, India. He has worked in different mainstream areas of research, including distributed ledger technology (blockchain and cryptocurrencies), networking (ICN and SDN), and AI (GAN-based password cracking). However, the main theme of his research has always been security and privacy. His research work is multidisciplinary. Currently, He is focusing on Blockchain-, Privacy-, and Security-related research areas.

Work experience: 08.2021 - present – Assistant Professor, International Institute of Information Technology, Hyderabad, India. 09.2019 - 08.2021 – Post Doctoral Fellow at University of Haifa, Israel. 09.2017 - 09.2019 – Post Doctoral Fellow at Indian Institute of Technology, Bombay, India. Education: 2018 – Ph.D, Chennai Mathematical Institute, Siruseri, India. 2013 – M.Sc., Chennai Mathematical Institute, Siruseri, India. 2010 – B.Tech, Indian Institute of Technology, Kanpur, India.
